_header: Complain ne could ne might mine heart never
_description: ‘A Balade of Compleynte’, associated with Chaucer — three stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
Compleyne ne koude ne might myn heart neuerMy peynes halue ne what
                    turment I haue…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…I yowe beseche myne heryes ladye hereSith I yowe serve and so
                    wil yere by yere
